::Battera::

She is in hybernation mode in her room on the Cybertron Fire. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> ::Windrazor lands near the Embassy::
> Windrazor: Perfect landing.
> ::He walks into the Embassy and sees that Vulois is meditating(not 
a mode.  
> Thats what he said he was doing before he left)::
> Windrazor: Just my luck.  Computer, who works for Vulois?
> Computer: Units Battera and Cybershark.
> Windrazor:(into com)  Cybershark, Battera.  You may not know me but 
I've had 
> reports on Cybertron.  I would like to join you two and Vulois.  
But I would 
> like to tell you something.  Negotiations at the Alliance have 
failed.  
> Soundwave has been doublecrossed and killed.  Will you let me join 
you?
